rules.ruleDescription: B hold -> Search menu apps / Skim note
N hold -> New note / Skim highlight
LCMD - left  (tap), return to last app (tap-tap), switcher (tap-tap-hold)

manipulatorSources.description: ESCAPE - ESC (tap), kill foreground (hold), kill unresponsive (tap-tap-hold)
ESCAPE - ESC (tap), kill foreground (hold), kill unresponsive (tap-tap-hold)

rules.ruleDescription: ESCAPE - ESC (tap), kill foreground (hold), kill unresponsive (tap-tap-hold)

manipulatorSources.description: LEFT CTRL + ESCAPE - Activity Monitor (tap), Process Spy (hold)

rules.ruleDescription: LEFT CTRL + ESCAPE - Activity Monitor (tap), Process Spy (hold)
CAPS - HSLAUNCHER (alone), HYPER (hold), SUPER (with shift), MEH (with ctrl)
SPACE - tap for space, hold for layer

manipulatorSources.description: Tilde - self (tap), Hyper+F5 down (tap-hold down), Hyper+F5 up (tap-hold up)

rules.ruleDescription: RCMD + Key - App launch or focus
